relation: During school club hours, the play room helps you relax your mind off a class.
Food has changed and become very healthy. Snack machines also have healthy snacks.
Great resources to help academic area.
Make sure you connect with any clubs and resources you can. This can help have a simply and easy college experience.
York College is a multicultural college. It has small classes and professors give more attentions to students. This gives students opportunities to grow and have a successful career.
pageTitle: CUNY York College Reviews: Student Reviews and Ratings | Cappex
TableContextTimeStampAfterTable: {161921=© 2015, Cappex.com, LLC, 121191=In 2012 I transferred over to Cuny-York college. I'm majoring in Spanish with bilingual education, the Spanish department along with the education department have been very helpful. The professors are excellent and make my time worthwhile.}
textBeforeTable: 10/17/2010 Reviewer is A current student here. 5 out of 5 people found this review useful. 1 of 43 Yvonne from Fresh Meadows, NY Check out reviews left by other students or leave your own review. textAfterTable: Categories Comments Campus Safety many security guards to aid in your safety. Clubs and Activities over thirty clubs and activities. like the international students club, music club, soccer club and dance club among others. Great for these types of students international students, social work, performing arts and occupational therapy majors. Share any unusual traditions or locations on campus blanket day, where for fifteen minutes students are allowed to take out there blankets and take a short nap. What to do for fun hit the gym, walk on the avenue and do some shopping, join the performing arts group, play a sports and swim in our massive pool. Food and Dining excellent food and cuisine to satisfy everyone. in addition york college is in close proximity to the city therefore there a many food courts to choose from. Dorm Life unfortunately york college don't have any dorms. Academic Rigor its ok
